price: Dan jika kamu sekalian menghendaki (keridaan) Allah dan rasulnya-Nya serta (kesenangan) di negeri akhirat, maka sesungguhnya Allah menyediakan bagi siapa yang berbuat baik di antaramu pahala yang besar.
arabic: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kuntunna turid'na al-laha warasūlahu wal-dāra al-ākhirata fa-inna al-laha aʿadda lil'muḥ'sināti minkunna ajran ʿaẓīman
